item.title: Federal Reserve expected to stand pat on rates even as Trump demands cuts - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. Federal Reserve expected to stand pat on rates even as Trump demands cuts  The Associated Press
  2. The Fed's big Trump question  Axios
  3. Bond Traders Shift Focus to Fed as Trump Shadows the Outlook  Bloomberg
  4. The Fed will likely stand pat after flurry of rate cuts. After that? It's anybody's guess.  USA TODAY
  5. Fed expected to pause rate cuts as it begins to weigh Trump policies  The Washington Post
